My Work

Some of my favorite projects:

Weather

JavaScript weather app. Uses the Open Weather API. Integrates a serverless function via Netlify for secure use of the API key. Uses browser local storage to save location.

Live Site | Github

CK Blues

My Harvard CS50 Web capstone project. Django web app that helps guitar players improve their guitar playing. Free and premium content. Sign up for an account.

Youtube Video | Github

Library

JavaScript personal library app that keeps track books and read status. Uses Javascript objects & prototype methods. Uses browser local storage to save books.

Live Site | Github

Network

Django web app. Twitter-like social network website for making posts, liking posts, and following users.

Youtube Video | Github

Other projects:

Loan Calculator

JavaScript web app that helps estimate monthly payments, total payment, and total interest on a loan.

Live Site | Github

Etch-A-Sketch

JavaScript sketch-pad web app based on the classic mechanical drawing toy called the Etch-A-Sketch.

Live Site | Github

Task Tracker

React JS app that utilizes components, props, and the useState hook.

Live Site | Github

Mail

Django web app. Designed a front-end for an email client that makes API calls to send and receive emails.

Youtube Video | Github

Restaurant Page

JavaScript web app. JS module for each tab/page. Modules are bundled together using Webpack.

Live Site | Github

Commerce

Django web app. eBay-like auction site. Post listings, place bids, and leave comments. Add listings to a watchlist.

Youtube video | Github
